page.title: 13Where I Play.
page.content:
I mostly play in my bedroom. I play with my Barbie doll with my sister and my friends. Sometimes I sit at my desk writing or drawing. I like making things at my desk. Sometimes I lie on my bed reading. I like to play hide and seek with my friends. I hide under my sister's bed or in our cupboard. Sometimes I put a mat on the floor and do gymnastics. {(Rachel,aged 9)}
I play at the bottom of Pinfield Close where there's a building site. I play in the sand with my friend. We make tunnels for the model cars to go through. Sometimes we play on the muck hills behind the houses. We play at war, using sticks as guns.We use scaffolding poles for bazookas and we build barricades to play in. {(Kirk, aged 8)
